fieldUpdates.description: Using CASE to be more flexibel in case Deals Team will request different tracking duration per country.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( EBH_DealSiteId__c , "77", EBH_DealEndDate__c +30, "3", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, "71", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, "101", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, "186", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, "0", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, "2", EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30, EBH_DealEndDate__c + 30)
fieldUpdates.name: Set Deal Tracking End Date

fieldUpdates.name: Set In_Revision DateTime

fieldUpdates.name: Set Statement Send Date

fieldUpdates.description: [#EPH-7598] Deal Object - Subsidy fields redesign for Invoicing US-0006818 - 2020-02-27
fieldUpdates.name: Subsidy Running

fieldUpdates.description: Update Dispute Subsidy (US-0009180), US-0010597 - Move Time-Base Deal Process Builder to Time-Base Deal Flow
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance') && INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit'), ((Sold_Items_60_Days__c + Sold_Items_Disputes__c) * Subsidy_Per_Unit_Disputes__c) - (X1st_Payout_Amount__c + X2nd_Payout_Amount__c), IF(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance') && NOT(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit')), Sold_Items_Disputes__c * EBH_Subsidy__c, IF(NOT(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance')) && INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit'), (Sold_Items_60_Days__c * Subsidy_Per_Unit_Disputes__c) - (X1st_Payout_Amount__c + X2nd_Payout_Amount__c) , 0.00) ))
fieldUpdates.name: UpdateDisputeSubsidy

fieldUpdates.description: Update Further Dispute Subsidy (US-0009180), US-0010597 - Move Time-Base Deal Process Builder to Time-Base Deal Flow
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance') && INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit'), ((Sold_Items_60_Days__c + Sold_Items_Disputes__c + Sold_Items_Further_Disputes__c ) * Subsidy_Per_Unit_Further_Disputes__c) - (X1st_Payout_Amount__c + X2nd_Payout_Amount__c + Subsidy_Due_Disputes__c ), IF(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance') && NOT(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit')), Sold_Items_Further_Disputes__c * EBH_Subsidy__c, IF(NOT(INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Quantity Variance')) && INCLUDES(Dispute_Type__c, 'Subsidy Per Unit'), (Sold_Items_60_Days__c * Subsidy_Per_Unit_Further_Disputes__c ) - (X1st_Payout_Amount__c + X2nd_Payout_Amount__c + Subsidy_Due_Disputes__c) , 0.00) ))
fieldUpdates.name: UpdateFurtherDisputeSubsidy
